review: This thing does the job. I had a "smart" Blu-ray player that did nothing but skip and freeze, but didn't want to shell out for a new one. This was a great inexpensive solution to my problem. It's true there aren't many apps out for it right now, but Netflix and Crunchyroll are really all I need. The only other downside is that the apps don't auto-play the next episode in a series, but Netflix has said they'll fix that in an update.  I also like that it cycles through pictures when idle instead of leaving a still image that will cause screen burn in on my old TV.
